verses.text: These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, Abihu, Eleazar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abihu \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; \w so|strong="H1961"\w* Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar \w served|strong="H3547"\w* \w as|strong="H3547"\w* \w priests|strong="H3547"\w*.

\w With|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w help|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eleazar’s \w descendant|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar’s \w descendant|strong="H1121"\w* Ahimelech, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w according|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w offices|strong="H6486"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1732"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w*.

\w Since|strong="H4480"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* Eleazar’s \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar, they \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* accordingly. \w There|strong="H4672"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar.

\w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God \w among|strong="H5973"\w* both Eleazar’s \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar’s \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethanel|strong="H5417"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* names \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w*: \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, Ahimelech \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abiathar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*—\w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w being|strong="H1004"\w* \w taken|strong="H5608"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Eleazar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w then|strong="H4428"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Ithamar.
The first lot fell to Jehoiarib, the second to Jedaiah,
the third to Harim, the fourth to Seorim,
the fifth to Malchijah, the sixth to Mijamin,
the seventh to Hakkoz, the eighth to Abijah,
the ninth to Jeshua, the tenth to Shecaniah,
the eleventh to Eliashib, the twelfth to Jakim,
the thirteenth to Huppah, the fourteenth to Jeshebeab,
the fifteenth to Bilgah, the sixteenth to Immer,
the seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Happizzez,
the nineteenth to Pethahiah, the twentieth to Jehezkel,
the twenty-first to Jachin, the twenty-second to Gamul,
the twenty-third to Delaiah, and the twenty-fourth to Maaziah.

\w This|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6680"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* entered \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w according|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w regulations|strong="H4941"\w* \w prescribed|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* forefather Aaron, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*. The Rest of the Levites

Now these \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*: From the sons of Amram: Shubael;\f + \fr 24:20 \ft Shubael (twice in this verse) is a variant of Shebuel; see 1 Chronicles 23:16 and 1 Chronicles 26:24.\f* from the sons of Shubael: Jehdeiah.
As for Rehabiah, from his sons: The first was Isshiah.\f + \fr 24:21 \ft Isshiah is a variant of Jeshaiah; see 1 Chronicles 26:25.\f*
From the Izharites: Shelomoth;\f + \fr 24:22 \ft Shelomoth (twice in this verse) is a variant of Shelomith; see 1 Chronicles 23:18.\f* from the sons of Shelomoth: Jahath.
From the sons of Hebron: Jeriah was the first,\f + \fr 24:23 \ft Hebrew From the sons: Jeriah; see 1 Chronicles 23:19.\f* Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, and Jekameam the fourth.
From the sons of Uzziel: Micah; from the sons of Micah: Shamir.
The brother of Micah: Isshiah; from the sons of Isshiah: Zechariah.
The sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi. The son of Jaaziah: Beno.
The descendants of Merari from Jaaziah: Beno, Shoham, Zaccur, and Ibri.
From Mahli: Eleazar, who had no sons.
From Kish: Jerahmeel the son of Kish.

And the sons of Mushi: Mahli, Eder, and Jerimoth.\f + \fr 24:30 \ft Jerimoth is a variant of Jeremoth; see 1 Chronicles 23:23.\f* \w These|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3881"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1571"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w did|strong="H1732"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, Ahimelech, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w families|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*—\w the|strong="H6440"\w* family \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w* \w alike|strong="H1571"\w*.
